comments:

using the JUnit plugin test.

Creating a new launching configuration doesn't help.

It seems that when I imported the projects, I didn't update the right version.
Replacing it with the 0227 version fixed it. I don't know why the default
runtime wasn't the one I was running.
You can close as INVALID.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 33458 ***
